system.notes: Often worn by Farseers. Wearers can make -30 Willpower Test to remain unaffected by results of Psychic Phenomena or Perils of the Warp. Doesn't prevent others being affected.

description.value: Often worn by Farseers. Wearers can make -30 Willpower Test to remain unaffected by results of Psychic Phenomena or Perils of the Warp. Doesn't prevent others being affected.
